title: Japan Domestic Corporate Goods Price Index
description: Producer Prices in Japan increased to 117.50 points in October from 116.30 points in September of 2022. Producer Prices in Japan averaged 89.23 points from 1960 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 117.50 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 47.40 points in June of 1962. In Japan, the Producer Price Index measures the average change in price of goods and services sold by manufacturers and producers in the wholesale market during a given period. This page provides - Japan Producer Prices - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Japan
